item.title: Hindustan Unilever Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Hindustan Unilever, a leading FMCG stock, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development often signals a shift towards a bearish trend and suggests a weakening momentum in the stock’s price trajectory over the longer term. Time: 2 hours ago
